events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to request a refund as it doesn't fit me well.
The case has been classified under refund requests based on the customer's message mentioning a refund.
An available customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 78451239. Yes, the jacket is still new and hasn't been worn or removed from its plastic packaging.
Thank you for the details. We can start the refund process immediately. We'll provide you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket.
That works perfectly for me, thank you for making this so easy and quick to arrange.
We have sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if thereâ€™s anything further we can assist you with.
The refund issue has been resolved and the case is now closed. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again.
